title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when trying to close all editors by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: When selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all open editors should be closed, regardless of whether changes have been saved or not.
SR:
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Open multiple files in the editor.
3. Make changes to some of the files.
4. Go to the file menu and select 'Close All Saved'.
5. Verify that all open editors are closed, regardless of whether changes have been saved or not.
